verbs.description: ( CNN ) -- [ARG1: The New York Times] [V: is] [ARG2: out with a bombshell story detailing how a ) Vice President Mike Pence and his advisers are operating as a sort of de facto political unit within the White House and b ) allies of President Donald Trump are none too happy about that fact] .
